name: SCNParticleBirthLocation
desc: Options for the initial location of each emitted particle, used by the birthLocation property.

items.name: case surface
items.desc: New particles can be created at any location on the surface of the emitter shape.

items.name: case volume
items.desc: New particles can be created at any location within the volume of the emitter shape.

items.name: case vertex
items.desc: New particles can be created at only at the locations of the vertices in the emitter shape.
